title: LFM Ranked 5's Team Gold 5 +
body:
Hey All,

Looking for players for a ranked 5s team. Nothing too serious but trolls and ragers need not add me.

I would prefer you played meta champs (or at least can play them) and are available at least a few nights a week.

Playing a few tonight, add me if youre down and ill try to hit you up during the week. 

Only position filled thus far is ADC - Me

Only requirements are Skype and being 17+ (just for maturity)

Cheers.

replies.body: Thats too bad you dont accept silvers :(
hey gold supp ign scabboy add plz

If positions are still available, i am interested.

Gold 5, can play any position

Cheers.
Hey, me and my mate me (Plat 4 top main) and him (gold 4 support/jg main) would be interested if you found a mid and jg/support. We are both on at least a few nights a week and have skype.
